verses.verse: Paul,<WG3972> a prisoner<WG1198> of Christ<WG5547> Jesus,<WG2424> and<WG2532> Timothy<WG5095> our brother,<WG80> to Philemon,<WG5371> our<WG2257> beloved<WG27> fellow worker,<WG4904>
<WG2532> to<WG27> the beloved<WG27> Apphia,<WG682> to<WG27> Archippus,<WG751> our<WG2257> fellow soldier,<WG4961> and<WG2532> to the assembly<WG1577> in<WG2596> your<WG4675> house:<WG3624>

hearing<WG191> of your<WG4675> love,<WG26> and<WG2532> of the faith<WG4102> which<WG3739> you have<WG2192> toward<WG4314> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus,<WG2424> and<WG2532> toward<WG1519> all<WG3956> the saints;<WG40>

that<WG3704> the fellowship<WG2842> of your<WG4675> faith<WG4102> may become<WG1096> effective,<WG1756> in<WG1722> the knowledge<WG1922> of every<WG3956> good thing<WG18> which is<WG3588> in<WG1722> us<WG5213> in<WG1519> Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>

yet for<WG1223> love<WG26>'s sake<WG1223> I<WG3870> rather<WG3123> beg,<WG3870> being<WG5607> such a one<WG5108> as<WG5613> Paul,<WG3972> the aged,<WG4246> but<WG1161> <WG3570> also<WG2532> a prisoner<WG1198> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>
I beg<WG3870> you<WG4571> for<WG4012> my<WG1700> child,<WG5043> whom<WG3739> I have become the father<WG1080> of in<WG1722> my<WG3450> chains,<WG1199> Onesimus,<WG3682>
who<WG3588> once<WG4218> was<WG3588> useless<WG890> to you,<WG4671> but<WG1161> now<WG3570> is useful<WG2173> to you<WG4671> and<WG2532> to me.<WG1698>
I am sending him<WG846> back.<WG375> <WG4771> Therefore<WG1161> receive<WG4355> him,<WG846> that<WG5124> is,<WG2076> my own<WG1699> heart,<WG4698>

whom<WG3739> I<WG1473> desired<WG1014> to keep<WG2722> with<WG4314> me,<WG1683> that<WG2443> on<WG5228> your<WG4675> behalf<WG5228> he might serve<WG1247> me<WG3427> in<WG1722> my chains<WG1199> for the Good News.<WG2098>

Having confidence<WG3982> in<WG5218> your<WG4675> obedience,<WG5218> I write<WG1125> to you,<WG4671> knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> you will do<WG4160> even<WG2532> beyond<WG5228> what I say.<WG3004>

<WG1161><WG99999> Also,<WG2532> prepare<WG2090> a guest room<WG3578> for me,<WG3427> for<WG1063> I hope<WG1679> that<WG3754> through<WG1223> your<WG5216> prayers<WG4335> I will be restored<WG5483> to you.<WG5213>

as do Mark,<WG3138> Aristarchus,<WG708> Demas,<WG1214> and Luke,<WG3065> my<WG3450> fellow workers.<WG4904>
